Articles.Content:
Hey, once again I'm not happy with the SAS performance in 0.22, the one in 0.21.1 was fine. But I guess you can't make everyone happy, some people like it some way, other people like it other way, noobs might like it some crazy way.

I guess SAS is some kind of PID controller, would be nice if you would let us modify the gains of each term (proportional, integral and derivative), something like a small window with 3 numbers. I guess that would make many experienced players very happy and it could have some default values for beginners.

I would really like to see this in game and it would remove forever the annoyances that we get with SAS in every new patch.

Thank you,

Aphobius
